name: Private Ortega
descriptions: Private Ortega is an  NCR soldier guarding their sharecropper farms in 2281.
A trooper serving in the NCR Army since 2279, Private Ortega ensures the safety of the farms. Mostly, this means patrolling and taking potshots at molerats.
Like her superior, Lieutenant Romanowski, she believes any complaints by the sharecroppers are the result of incompetence, rather than genuine lack of resources.

topics.response_text: Is there something I can do for you?
I'll help you if I can. What are you looking for?
There's the medic at Camp McCarran, but I've also heard there's a civilian doctor in the northeast part of New Vegas. I don't know for sure.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking to buy and sell things.
topics.response_text: The Crimson Caravan Company is north of here. They have just about everything you need.

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: I'm a private in the NCR army, and I've been proudly serving for two years now.
It's NCR-owned farmland. It produces a lot of the crops that supply McCarran and the Dam. The farmers are all civilians, though.
I shouldn't have brought it up. It's not my place to spread gossip.

topics.topic_text: Anything you tell me stays with me.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right. Some of the farmers, especially Trent Bascom, claim the NCR isn't giving them the water they need to meet their crop quotas.

topics.topic_text: Come on, you can tell me.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Not my place to talk. Sorry.
Oh, you'd better believe it. I feel sorry for the troops who are charged with keeping the Fiends from overrunning everything.

topics.topic_text: If the Fiends are so dangerous, why hasn't the NCR wiped them out?
topics.response_text: Current orders are to hold the line and nothing more. That's all we seem to do these days - hold the line.
Well, I know Major Dhatri is offering bounties on some of the Fiends - that's the gang that controls the southeast part of the city.
